Endereço do Cliente

Valid first name is required.
Valid last name is required.
Valid first CPF/CNPJ is required.
Valid last e-mail is required.
Valid first CEP is required.
Valid last Bairro required.
Valid first Rua (Logradouro) is required.
Valid last number is required.
Please select a valid country.
Please provide a valid state.
